description: Effective leaders make data-driven decisions. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform strategic choices.
generated_text: "Module 12: Data" (47 minutes, Intermediate). Effective leaders make data-driven decisions. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform strategic choices. Discover how to identify key metrics, create data visualizations, and present insights to stakeholders. Apply data analysis techniques to drive business outcomes and improve organizational performance.
